message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product for $9,500. This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to respond quickly to secure this exceptional deal.
Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to spend a bit less.  I'm willing to pay $8,500 for the product.  Let me know if that works for you.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your budget constraints. However, I must maintain the value of our product. I am unable to accept $8,500. My counteroffer is $9,000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
